items.title: Fried Okra
items.description: Comes with our house dipping sauce and lemon wedges.

items.title: House Cut Seasoned French Fries
items.description: Basket of house-cut seasoned french fries served with house dipping sauce. Gluten-free.

items.title: Garlic Fries
items.description: House-cut fries with our house garlic fry mixture. Served with house dipping sauce. Gluten-free.

items.title: Sweet Potato Fries
items.description: 8 bite size southern style battered fried tofu served with our house dipping sauce, BBQ sauce and hot sauce.

items.title: Souley Vegans Creole Nachos
items.description: Seitan. Tortilla chips topped with our house made Creole style vegan nacho cheese, house made seitan, green onion, finely chopped lettuce, diced tomato.

items.title: Southern Fried Tofu Minis
items.description: Bite size Southern style battered fried tofu served with our house dipping sauce, BBQ sauce, and hot sauce.

items.title: Sea Salt Spinach Dip
items.description: Served with artesian crackers and celery. A pinch of seaweed and a combination of house mixed spices gives this dip the deliciousness only found in the bayous of the Deep South.

items.title: Okra Gumbo Over Grits
items.description: Okra, tomato, corn, onions, garlic, bell peppers, and seaweed. The Gumbo will speak for itself coupled with the grits. The pair rules a portion of the world. (wink wink)

items.title: Butter Leaf Lettuce Cup
items.description: Four pieces. Butter leaf lettuce topped with falafel, diced tomato our house made kale sauce and a sprinkle of cayenne

items.title: Black Eyed Fritters
items.description: Five pieces. Served with our house blend of olive oil, sea salt, black pepper fresh garlic. Topped with fresh cilantro. Gluten-free.

items.title: Seitan Spicy Strips
items.description: Eight pieces. In house made seitan strips served with a side of fresh carrots, celery and house dipping sauce. Very spicy.

items.title: Creole Pop'ens
items.description: Five fresh cut lightly sauteed jalapenos covered in our house made Creole style vegan cheezee, battered and fried to a crisp golden brown. Served with our house made ranch dipping sauce. Spicy.

items.title: Monster Salad
items.description: Green leaf lettuce, fresh baby spinach, cucumber, tomato, shredded carrots, sea salt, black pepper, and olive oil served with a side of balsamic vinegar.

items.title: Green Salad
items.description: Green leaf lettuce, fresh baby spinach, cucumber, tomato, shredded carrots, sea salt, black pepper, and olive oil served with a side of balsamic vinegar.

items.title: Chick Pea Salad
items.description: Iceberg lettuce, sliced carrots, cabbage, sunflower seeds, yellow corn, and lightly sauteed spicy chick peas. Includes house dressing.

items.title: Southern Fried Tofu Burger
items.description: Battered crispy tofu with vegan mayo, ketchup, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and onions.

items.title: Black Bean and Quinoa Veggie Burger
items.description: In house made patty (Quinoa, black bean, and carrots). Comes with vegan mayo sprouts and sliced tomato.

items.title: Portobello Mushroom Burger
items.description: Served with vegan mayo, ketchup, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions and a green salad.

items.title: BBQ Tofu Burger
items.description: Served with vegan mayo, ketchup, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions and your choice of side.

items.title: Toasty Burger
items.description: Combination of the BBQ tofu and southern fried tofu. Served with vegan mayo, ketchup, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions and a green salad.

items.title: Seitan Po'Boy
items.description: Served on a lightly toasted sourdough baguette brushed with olive oil with house made shrimp or chick'in style seitan, shredded lettuce, tomato, mustard, and onion, with our special Po Boy sauce. Served with Seasoned Fries.

items.title: Seitan Steak Burger
items.description: Single seitan fried steak topped with grilled onions. Served wit vegan mayo, ketchup, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, and a green salad.

items.title: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
items.description: PB and J on whole wheat bread served with a side of carrots.

items.title: Simply Veggies Sandwich
items.description: Served on ciabatta with vegan mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickles, sprouts, and cucumber, topped with our house sauce.

items.title: Country Style Seitan Steak Plate
items.description: Seitan steak topped with grilled onions and gravy served with a side of collard greens and mashed potato.

items.title: Creole Style Spaghetti
items.description: Semolina spaghetti noodles glazed in olive oil, sea salt, and course black pepper. Our sauce is spiced perfectly and topped with falafel.

items.title: Okra Gumbo
items.description: Mix of pepper, corn, seaweed, tomato, non-gmo tofu, onion, garlic, and spices. Spice level is medium.

items.title: Beautifully Battered Kale
items.description: The beautifully battered kale sits atop fresh baby spinach topped with our zesty kale sauce and lemon wedges.

items.title: Couscous Plate
items.description: Couscous prepared with glazed onions, mushrooms and yellow corn served with house salad and lightly sauteed semi spicy chick peas.

items.title: Wild Rice and Seitan Casserole with Broccoli Florets
items.description: Lightly sautéed wild rice with “Kale Bone” (seitan), broccoli florets, onions, and garlic, served with house salad.

items.title: Seitan "Chick" n Waffles
items.description: House made seitan served with a Belgian waffle, vegan butter, and syrup.

items.title: Sample Platter
items.description: Greens, yams, black-eyed peas, potato salad, mac n Cheese, southern fried tofu, BBQ tofu, and corn bread.

items.title: Combination Plates
items.description: Build your own plate. Combos come with your choice of corn bread or green salad.

items.title: Southern Fried Tofu Bowl
items.description: Grits topped with Southern fried tofu topped with our delicious okra gumbo. You’ve arrived at happiness.

items.title: Vanilla Cake
items.description: With chocolate ganache and walnuts.

items.title: Red Velvet with Cream Cheese Frosting
